name: Sin Kang TCM Clinic - Hillion Mall

reviews.text:
Therapist Kelly is professional, skilled and versatile. She is highly knowledgeable in massage and well-versed in TCM, thus deploys the right combination of therapy methods on the patient's individual needs. Always impressive.

Physician Zhao is experienced and skilled in TCM, and always careful to ensure every detail of the patient's needs are well taken care of, in her gentle and professional style. I always feel better with her acupuncture treatment.

Excellent clear explanation from Physician Gow, on my condition. Very skilled. She relieved my aching neck with bone adjustment and acupuncture.

Counter staff YuRou is a sweet little angel and always ready to make reservations and adjustments accordingly, with precision and accuracy. And seeing her smile is always a treat :).

These ladies are dynamic, energetic and cheerful personalities, which makes each visit a lovely time and experience. Looking forward to seeing them next week for review and continuous improvement.

I’m very satisfied with the services here. My physician, Ms. Gow, provided a thorough consultation and demonstrated great expertise and care. She took the time to understand my concerns and offered detailed guidance. Highly recommend this TCM service!

Kelly is a fantastic Tuina therapist. She is very knowledgeable and customises the treatments to suit my needs. I sought treatment for pain in my knees and she has helped to alleviate the pain and advised me on methods to manage the pain.The counter staff are always friendly and accommodating with making appointments and changes.
Great experience with xiao Feng as my masseuse. She was very professional and friendly, giving me tips as to how to relieve some of my body ailments. Highly recommend!

Writing this as I left the session feeling much better.

I had a two hour Tuina session with Sharon yesterday. She’s been at this outlet for two months, with seven years of experience overall. Her technique is unique and effective, where she use firm, rhythmic pressure on meridian points to release tension and improve energy flow.

She also took time to understand my pain and tailored the treatment, which really helped with relaxation and relief. Highly recommend her if you're looking for a skilled Tuina therapist with a special touch.

One area to improve: Consider adding more stretches.
